author: Newsweek
title: DraftKings Promo Code: Bet $5 on TNF or CFB, Score $150 Bonus Instantly
text:
Sports Betting Dime provides exclusive sports betting commercial content to Newsweek, including real-time odds, picks, analysis and premier sportsbook offers to help sports fans get in on the action. Please wager responsibly.
Football fans who sign up for DraftKings Sportsbook can take advantage of the site’s outstanding “Bet $5, Get $150” welcome offer.
Register for this DraftKings promo code offer and turn a $5+ wager on Jets-Browns or a college football game like Arizona-Oklahoma into an instant $150 bonus, win or lose.
DraftKings Sportsbook BET $5, GET $150! BONUS BETS
STATES: AZ, CO, IA, IL, IN, KS, KY, LA, MA, MD, MI, NJ, NY, OH, PA, TN, VA, WV. 21 and present in participating states. Gambling problem? Call 1-800-Gambler. 21 . Physically present in MA. Eligibility restrictions apply. Valid 1 per new customer. First-time depositors only who have not already redeemed $200 in bonus bets via OH or MA prelaunch offer. Min. $5 deposit. Min $5 bet. $200 issued as bonus bets that expire 7 days (168 hours) after being awarded. See terms at http://draftkings.com/ma.
Our DraftKings code links qualify new users for a $150 bonus. Place $5 on the NFL or college football, and DK will issue the bonus on the spot, no questions asked.
Thursday Night Football in
NFL Week 17 features the Jets (6-9) and Browns (10-5). Cleveland is a 7.5-point favorite on DraftKings in a game with an over/under of just 34.5 points, the lowest Week 17 total. Fans longing for a game with explosive offenses will enjoy Arizona-Oklahoma in the Valero Alamo Bowl, a game with a 59.5-point O/U. The 14th-ranked Wildcats are 2.5-point favorites versus the 12th-ranked Sooners.
Bet $5 on TNF or college football and get $150 in bonus bets instantly once you
qualify for this DraftKings promo code offer.
DraftKings Promo Code: Bet $5 on TNF or CFB, Score $150 Bonus Instantly
DraftKings makes life incredibly simple for first-time bettors. Instead of stressing about your first bet, throw as little as $5 on any prop from Jets-Browns, Arizona-Oklahoma or another market. Without hesitation, DraftKings will deliver a $150 bonus that arrives as six $25 bonus bets, giving users an immediate bankroll for tonight’s games.
Every player can earn withdrawable cash profit through their bonus bets. For example, a $25 bonus bet on Browns -7.5 (+100 odds) returns $25 in cash after a win. You can also target props with longer odds to shoot for higher payouts, like Amari Cooper Anytime Touchdown Scorer (+165). Cooper, who had 265 receiving yards and two touchdowns last Sunday, would fetch DraftKings bettors $41.25 in withdrawable cash winnings if he scores tonight.
How to Claim $150 Bonus with DraftKings Promo Code
Don’t miss the opportunity to land a guaranteed 30-1 payout with any $5 wager. Follow DraftKings’ registration instructions below to secure $150 in bonus bets tonight:
New DraftKings bettors receive six $25 bonus bets after their qualifying wager. The bonus bets expire seven days after receipt.
No Sweat SGP/SGPx
DraftKings customers qualify for more offers after the “Bet $5, Get $150.” For example, every player can place a “No Sweat” Same Game Parlay on Jets-Browns, Arizona-Oklahoma or another game tonight. Your 3+ leg SGP or SGPx triggers a bonus bet refund after a loss.
DK also has a “Stepped Up” promo for college football. Any 3+ leg CFB parlay comes with a profit boost. More legs equals a larger boost until the potential profit doubles.
Bet $5 on the NFL or CFB to score $150 in guaranteed bonus bets when you
activate this DraftKings promo code offer.
